entry.title: yevhenlisovenko/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: AirDrop-Checker/solana-airdrop-checker: Solana Airdrop Checker is a lightweight tool to instantly verify airdrop eligibility, detect phishing scams, and monitor SPL token/NFT rewards on Solana. Scan wallets via Phantom/Solflare, block malicious contracts, and track MEV-linked airdrops (Jito, priority fees). Open-source, secure, and optimized for DeFi/NFT users.
entry.content: Solana Airdrop Checker is a lightweight tool to instantly verify airdrop eligibility, detect phishing scams, and monitor SPL token/NFT rewards on Solana. Scan wallets via Phantom/Solflare, block malicious contracts, and track MEV-linked airdrops (Jito, priority fees). Open-source, secure, and optimized for DeFi/NFT users.

entry.title: ethhix/GameScanner: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.
entry.content: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.
